top-page.title:
Property Management
Made Easy
top-page.desc: Managing your property rentals is simpler than ever with Rentorr. Our property management software means you can take a hands off approach while still effectively managing your tenants and properties.

image-info-one.title: Comprehensive Screening Reports
image-info-one.desc: Make an informed decision before choosing a tenant with a comprehensive report.

item.title: Credit Reports and History
item.text: As part of our property manager software, you'll be able to weed out unfit applicants easily with overviews of their credit and financial histories to make well-informed decisions

item.title: Employment History
item.text: Another part of our tenant management system checks applicants' employment history so you only consider those with a steady income.

item.title: Affordability Score
item.text: Both landlord and tenant are protected by this service, which performs clever equations to determine whether an applicant can afford to pay for renting your property long term.

text.desc: Stop wondering how to collect rent from tenants online and make it happen with Rentorr. Payments are automatically sent to your bank account, and we'll even take care of collecting late fees.

text-start.title: Automated Late Fee Collection
text-start.text: The chances of tenants missing automated payments is slim, but if it does happen, our property manager services will automatically collect the appropriate late fees for you.

text-center.title: Flexible Rent Collection
text-center.text: Gone are the days of knocking on doors and making phone calls to ensure you get your rent payment-now Rentorr takes care of it for you, so you can enjoy more flexibility.

text-end.title: Effortless Cash Flow
text-end.text: Not only will you receive the rent payments from your tenants as they come in, but you'll also be able to check on the status of each individual tenant from a single dashboard.

image-info-two.title: List and Manage Your Property
image-info-two.desc: Rentorr is here to help with property rentals from start to finish. That means we begin by assisting you in creating quality listings. From there, you can manage your properties and even view your cash flow all from our property management system.

item.title: Create Beautiful Listings
item.text: By listing your properties using our system, you'll create eye-catching listings that attract toptier tenants. Photo galleries, floorplans, and more will all work to your advantage.

item.title: Online Rental Applications
item.text: Tenants can send you their applications directly, and then you'll be able to assess them side-byside within our property management portal.

item.title: Easy and Seamless Communication
item.text: No matter where you are, you can receive real-time alerts from tenants about maintenance requests and emergencies with Rentorr.

image-info-three.title: Scalable & Flexible Property Management
image-info-three.desc: Whether you'ree an individual landlord or a property management company, our services will automate a great deal of your work and make management a breeze.

item.title: List All Available Properties
item.text: Details about previous listings are all saved within your account, so you can call upon them if you're listing a similar property again.

item.title: Save time - do more
item.text: With all of your notifications and correspondences in one place, you'll know for sure that you're answering every question and putting out every fire.

item.title: Get Insights from Dashboards
item.text: Using a number of metrics, you'll be able to look at the overall health of your property management business with Rentorr.

relax.title: Ready to Land Great Tenants?
relax.desc: Simply write your listing then sit back and relax while Rentorr delivers the best possible applicants.

item-1.how-work-span: Provide all of the details that a tenant might be interested in, and let Rentorr do the rest
Make sure that all of the top applicants seen your property rentals when you boost them.
Rentorr will provide you with information about applicants' credit, finances, employment, and identity so you know what you're getting into.

item-2.how-work-span: You can easily evaluate applicants side by side and select the one that best fits your needs.
Don't worry about physically signing paper forms, simply use Rentorr to electronically make the rental official.
Issues with properties inevitably arise, but your tenant will be able to quickly communicate those issues through our platform.
